0.1.name: wordpress/kill-zippykid-never-email-passwords
0.1.description: ZippyKid, for all of their fine points, will always send 2 emails when a user signs up for your site if you're using any sort of non-standard registration. This plugin prevents ZK from messing with peoples' passwords. This plugin has no interface or settings, just turn it on and escape from the tyranny of a hosting company trying to control how your site works. Fight the power!
